genre: active indie rock, garage rock, electro guitar, overdriven, arctic monkeys style, melodic energy, mid-tempo groove, nocturnal urban rock

lines: (instrumental intro – melodic guitar riff, slow build, drums enter at 00:20, bass groove establishes)
Streetlights bleed through the window pane
Another ghost scrolling through the rain
Lost in the feed, a familiar refrain
Searching for a signal, trying to explain
Under neon stars, we drift alone
A thousand faces, unknown
Just echoes bouncing, on the stone
Searching for a way back home
(instrumental break – lead guitar riff, tight groove continues, brief melodic variation)
Screens glow brighter than the full moon
Chasing shadows, humming a broken tune
Fingers tap out a message too soon
Lost in the quiet of a crowded room
Under neon stars, we drift alone
A thousand faces, unknown
Just echoes bouncing, on the stone
Searching for a way back home
Maybe we're just wiring crossed
A signal lost in the data frost
Counting the seconds, what it cost
Everything we found, everything we lost
(extended outro – final chorus theme subtly woven into an instrumental jam, layered guitars build and slowly fade out, emotional resolution with lingering melodic motifs)
